ygData.subject: RE: Holy Bat Breath!
ygData.msgSnippet: everyone noticed the breath right away, as we have killed him with 24 ppl every time for the last couple months, and i don t remember any failed attempts.  our
ygData.messageBody:
everyone noticed the breath right away, as we have killed him with 24 ppl
every time for the last couple months, and i don't remember any failed
attempts. our cleric went OOM fast, and everyone in the bard groups were
getting pounded regardless of FR. we heard something about a 200+ bug, so
after everyone being 200+ on the first attempt, we tried just under 200 on
the 2nd and same result. i think with more healers and tanks we'd have no
problem with 30 ppl, but i think only a super-balanced group of 24 can do
him now.

and yes selo's drum is dangerous, not only for people in your grop but even
for us. started from oasis at full health and made it to lava druid ring at
1/2 bubb ;)

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L38 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>
>
> On Sat, 5 Feb 2000, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> > tried nagafen since patch? his breath is now outrageously
> powerful, or FR
> > doesn't do crap anymore.
>
> Killed him on Tuesday and Thursday, didn't notice much of a difference
> between times, but then there were around 40 people there both times.
> Never got feared, debuffs hit the useless ones (CR, PR, UV)
> and songs, and
> yeah the breath hurt. Base FR prior to buff/song was 116,
> level 49 bard,
> breath did a few hundred each application.
>
> Now that I have Selo's drum, weaving Rhythms with my default gear on
> boosts MR to 267. Gotta be careful showing others how fast
> Accelerando is
> though, especially in Lavastorm. -.-
>
> Athren Notechaser, 49th composition in progress
> Cazic-Thule
>
